zpyhelper.image.searchlight¶

This module contains classes for running searchlight MVPA analysis in nifti images. The code is adapted from nilearn.decoding.searchlight module @ https://github.com/nilearn/nilearn/blob/321494420/nilearn/decoding/searchlight.py

Classes

MVPASearchLight(patternimg_paths, mask_img_path)

Class for running searchlight analysis.

zpyhelper
